alert.note: Alert for Washakie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:25PM MDT until June 26 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHAKIE COUNTY... At 525 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Winchester, which is also 15 miles west of Worland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Washakie County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
